meta.article_title: August 22, 2022 - Developing Your Game at Different Ages

developing-your-game-at-different-ages.probleme: Different stages of life and tennis goals

debutant.nom: loop from both sides with feet parallel to the table
debutant.description: Loop forehands except when forced off the table. Teach counter-looping and short backspin/no-spin serves, with third-ball attack serves.

debutant.nom: backhand banana flips against short serves
debutant.description: Attack short serves with backhand banana flips.

intermediaire.description: Teach looping the backhand against backspin, but in rallies hit and block aggressively.
Focus on pushing back serves effectively.

avance.nom: long pips on the backhand for blocking
avance.description: Use long pips on the backhand to better block opponents' athletic loops and turn topspin into change-of-pace backspin.

avance.nom: short pips on the backhand for blocking
avance.description: Use short pips on the backhand to help with blocking and hitting.

exercices_complementaires.nom: long pips on the backhand for blocking drills
exercices_complementaires.description: Practice looping and blocking with long pips on the backhand.

erreurs_a_eviter.description: Avoid trying to jam the table when looping.
